name: Die, zombie sausage, die!
description: Arcade for the little ones. Hold on to the table against the zombie sausages as long as possible. Make your way to the top of the leaderboard.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: Intel Pentium CPU B960 2.2Ghz 2.2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 640 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 660 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space
